name: Natural Disaster (Prototype)
description:
Play as a chaotic evil butterfly exploring cause and effect in this point-and-click adventure inside a stereoscope!

The scene will play out without you. Through your interactions, you change what happens. Create chains of effect into the other seven scenes!

Features:

  • Exploratory, trial and error sandbox gameplay
  • Absurdism in plausible but extreme cause and effect
  • A fishbowl playspace with static scenes of an image reel
  • Characters that make your interactions feel person

CREDITS

Producers: Preston Phung, Bryanne Smith

Designers: Claire Engvall, Jarrod Valletta, Clay Grubbs

Engineers: Charlotte Seymour, Marissa Angell, Gabriela Anderson

Artists: Konny Fung, Bailey Inge, Andrew Lozano

Sound Designer: Meg Mordecai
